roleset.name: be in the lead

example.name: typical corporate-speak
example.text: Mr. Lortie joined Provigo in 1985 and spearheaded the company's drive to grow outside its traditional food business.
example.arg: the company's drive to grow outside its traditional food business.

roleset.note: SPEARHEAD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spearhead' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'lead'. (from spearhead.01-v predicate notes)
